betterquesting:10.desc:8:
With an Ordo attuned Aura Core crafted the rest should be a relative formality. You'll simply need to scan the aura core to gain the last bit of information you need, and do one final bit of research yourself to finalize your design.

Sneak-right click a Book of Knowledge onto an Arcane Pedestal to actually §oplace§r the book on it rather than §oput§r it on a pedestal like you're going to use it for Arcane Infusion.

Throw an unfinished research note near the book to get it to start researching. It will consume a steady supply of Cognitio Essentia and a fair bit of time, but given enough of both will complete the research note.

The Thaumonomicon says "placing any form of booster that can affact an enchantment table nearby" will boost research speed, albeit marginally, but I cannot confirm whether things like Botania's Mana Pylons actually do boost research speed. Nor whether blocks that give Enchantment Tables a larger boost than bookshelves give the Book of Knowledge a larger boost as well.

Regardless, it won't be difficult to procure a sufficient number of bookcases, at least. You've probably left at least a few behind in some Lich Tower or another, and you know where to get Silk Touch if you don't have another source of it laying around.
